entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
